price: 5. Een bevel van Ons. Waarlijk, Wij sturen voortdurend.
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
